text: @Yamiche My poor neighbors, in their 80s, married 60 years. He is having TRIPLE BYPASS FRIDAY and she is not allowed to be in hospital bc of coronavirus precautions in such a sensitive area😭😰she is devastated! She may never see him again. Been in cicu for 4 days and hasn't seen him🤯
